SELECT AA.id, AA.name2 AS name, sum(AA.cc) AS num, AA.area_point, AA.area_map FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.*, orgarea.area_point, orgarea.area_map FROM ( SELECT count(build.area_id) AS cc, build.area_id, area1. NAME AS name1, area1.parent_ids FROM ccm_house_buildmanage build, sys_area area1 WHERE build.area_id = area1.id AND build.del_flag = #{delFlag} GROUP BY build.area_id ) A RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT area2.id, area2. NAME AS name2 FROM sys_area area2 WHERE 1=1
and (${more1})
) B ON
A.area_id = B.id
A.parent_ids LIKE concat('%', B.id, '%')
LEFT JOIN ccm_org_area orgarea ON B.id = orgarea.area_id ) AA GROUP BY AA.id

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_area( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, code, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{code}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_area SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, code = #{code}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.parent_id,t.parent_ids,t.`name`,t.sort,t.`code`,t.type,t.create_by,t.create_date,t.update_by,t.update_date, t.remarks, t.del_flag FROM sys_area t WHERE t.type = #{type} and t.del_flag = 0
SELECT a.id AS "id" FROM sys_area a WHERE a.parent_ids LIKE concat(#{parentIds},'%') OR a.id = #{id} AND a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT a.id AS 'type', a.NAME AS 'typeO', IFNULL(p.person_amount,0) AS 'value' FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN ccm_people_amount p ON a.id = p.area_id WHERE a.type = 7 and (p.amount_date > date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m') AND p.amount_date < date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y-%m'))

SELECT a.id AS 'type', a.NAME AS 'typeO', IFNULL(p.float_amount,0) AS 'value' FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN ccm_people_amount p ON a.id = p.area_id WHERE a.type = 7 and (p.amount_date > date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m') AND p.amount_date < date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y-%m'))

SELECT a.id AS 'type', a.NAME AS 'typeO', (IFNULL(p.aids_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.psychogeny_amount,0) +IFNULL(p.rectification_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.release_amount,0) +IFNULL(p.drugs_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.behind_amount,0) +IFNULL(p.kym_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.visit_amount,0) +IFNULL(p.heresy_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.dangerous_amount,0)) AS 'value' FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN ccm_people_amount p ON a.id = p.area_id WHERE a.type = 7 and (p.amount_date > date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m') AND p.amount_date < date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y-%m')) ORDER BY (IFNULL(p.aids_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.psychogeny_amount,0) +IFNULL(p.rectification_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.release_amount,0) +IFNULL(p.drugs_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.behind_amount,0) +IFNULL(p.kym_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.visit_amount,0) +IFNULL(p.heresy_amount,0)+IFNULL(p.dangerous_amount,0)) DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT a.id AS 'type', a.NAME AS 'typeO', count( tenant.id ) AS 'value' FROM sys_area a JOIN ccm_house_buildmanage house ON a.id = house.area_id AND house.del_flag = 0 JOIN ccm_pop_tenant tenant ON house.id = tenant.building_id AND tenant.del_flag = 0 AND tenant.house_type = '02' WHERE a.type = 7 GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY count( tenant.id ) DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT a.id AS 'type', a.NAME AS 'typeO', count(u.id) AS 'value' FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.area_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON o.id = u.office_id AND u.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.type = 7 GROUP BY a.id
SELECT a.id AS 'type', a.NAME AS 'typeO', count(d.id) AS 'value' FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN ccm_device d ON a.id = d.area_id AND d.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.type = 7 GROUP BY a.id

SELECT a.id AS 'type', a.NAME AS 'typeO', count(d.id) AS 'value' FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN bph_alarm_info d ON a.id = d.area_id AND d.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.type = 7 GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY count(d.id) DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT sum(aa.value) FROM (SELECT count(u.id) AS 'value' FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.area_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON o.id = u.office_id AND u.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.type = 7 GROUP BY a.id) aa

SELECT a.id, IFNULL(b.label,'未知') AS 'name', count(a.id) AS 'num' FROM ccm_people a LEFT JOIN sys_dict b ON a.flow_rea = b.`value` AND b.type = 'ccm_flow_res' WHERE a.type = '20' GROUP BY b.label ORDER BY num
